about_the_game:
Mythrera is a top-down action RPG where you play as Sammyla in a magical world filled with monsters, treasure, and adventure. Explore the vast realm of Mythrera as you fight your way through hordes of enemies, collect powerful gear, and complete quests to gain experience and level up. With its fast-paced combat, expansive world, and deep character customization options, Mythrera is the ultimate action RPG experience!



Embark on an epic journey as Sammyla, a warrior with unmatched strength and determination. Battle against mythical creatures, discover hidden treasures, and interact with the inhabitants of Mythrera to uncover the secrets of this magical world.

Combat


A fast-paced and fun combat system, where you will be able to use different skills, increase your stats as you level up, and collect loots!

Inventory


Customize your character to suit your playstyle, with a variety of weapons and armor to choose from. You can focus on attack speed or damage, find legendary equipments, create your own character, depending upon your combat style!

Work In Progress


This game is made by one person, and is still a WIP. Will be release Q2 - Q3 2023, and the alpha version will be release soon.
